     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:698px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19667729">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19667729">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19667729">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19667729">
          <div id="boxatt19667729" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22991214">
              <a id="link_22991214" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991214,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22991214}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991211">
              <a id="link_22991211" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/50090124?databaseList=1708&amp;databaseList=638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991211,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22991211}); ">
               American Decades - Primary Sources
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Primary sources compiled by year located in the Trexler Library Stacks, Level C, at Ref. 973.92 A512dp.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991212">
              <a id="link_22991212" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1645522?databaseList=1708&amp;databaseList=638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991212,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22991212}); ">
               New York Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available in various formats, dependent on year.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991207">
              <a id="link_22991207" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991207,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22991207}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991219">
              <a id="link_22991219" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991219,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22991219}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19667825">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19667825">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19667825">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10149090">
          <div id="boxatt10149090" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23480670">
              <a id="link_23480670" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/berkchina" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23480670,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23480670}); ">
               Berkshire Encyclopedia of China
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides insight into Chinese history and culture today in nearly a thousand articles that include everything from Adoption and Banking to Wound Literature and the Zhou Dynasty. Designed for students, teachers, businesspeople, government officials, and tourists seeking a greater understanding of China today.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344701">
              <a id="link_12344701" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://histories.cambridge.org/uid=1931/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344701,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344701}); ">
               Cambridge Histories Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text online access to the complete 250-plus volumes of the Cambridge Histories reference series. Provides political, economic and social history, philosophy and literature of selected countries and subjects. Most histories are multi-volume, with invited editors and contributors of considerable renown.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20849405">
              <a id="link_20849405" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20849405,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469712">
              <a id="link_23469712" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/routafricanhistory" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469712,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469712}); ">
               Encyclopedia of African History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers the history of the entire African continent from Morocco, Libya, and Egypt in the north to the Cape of Good Hope in the south, and the surrounding islands from Cape Verde in the west to Madagascar, Mauritius, and Seychelles in the east.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469722">
              <a id="link_23469722" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BDB" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469722,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469722}); ">
               Encyclopedia of African-American Culture and History : The Black Experience in the Americas
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A five-volume set and supplement covering all aspects of the African-American experience from 1619 to the present day. Using biographies, historical essays, and thematic pieces, many written by foremost scholars, it addresses a wide array of subjects in over 2,300 articles to define in one source the cultural roots, participation in American life, and current condition of the African-American community.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469474">
              <a id="link_23469474" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/sageauh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469474,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469474}); ">
               Encyclopedia of American Urban History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A two volume A to Z encyclopedia covering the rise of urban America in the 20th century.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469747">
              <a id="link_23469747" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0IMU" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469747,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469747}); ">
               Encyclopedia of European Social History from 1350 to 2000
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covering the period from the beginning of the Renaissance to the present, this encyclopedia consists of 209 signed articles and nearly 300 biographical entries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12344702">
              <a id="link_12344702" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12344702,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344702}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Newly revised and online, well-respected resource complete with recommended readings for further study.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469964">
              <a id="link_23469964" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SFX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469964,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469964}); ">
               Encyclopedia of India
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A four-volume survey of the history, cultures, geography and religions of India from ancient times to the present day. Includes more than 600 entries, arranged alphabetically.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23470021">
              <a id="link_23470021" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0OUF" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23470021,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23470021}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Modern Asia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Online version of a six-volume survey of modern Asia, defined as extending from Japan in the east to Turkey in the west, and from Kazakhstan in the north to Indonesia in the south.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23470025">
              <a id="link_23470025" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFU" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23470025,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23470025}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Russian History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a comprehensive discussion of Russia's people, politics, economics, religion, and social systems; and is designed to complement the study of comparative politics, world history, geography, literature, arts and culture and world cultures. Entries span the period from the earliest beginnings of the Russian nation to the rise and fall of the Soviet Union.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469757">
              <a id="link_23469757" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0PFZ" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469757,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469757}); ">
               Europe, 1450 to 1789 : Encyclopedia of the Early Modern World
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A six-volume survey of European history from 1450, the beginning of the print revolution, to 1789 and the French Revolution. Presents over 1,000 alphabetically arranged entries covering the period's most significant personalities and meaningful developments in the arts, religion, politics, exploration, and warfare.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469753">
              <a id="link_23469753" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SFZ" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469753,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469753}); ">
               Europe 1789 to 1914 : Encyclopedia of the Age of Industry and Empire
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A five-volume survey of European history from the onset of the French Revolution to the outbreak of World War. Alphabetically arranged entries cover the period's most significant personalities and meaningful developments in the arts, religion, politics, exploration, and warfare.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469751">
              <a id="link_23469751" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/0SFY" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469751,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469751}); ">
               Europe since 1914 : Encyclopedia of the Age of War and Reconstruction
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A multi-volume survey of European history from the beginning of World War I in 1914 to the present, presented through alphabetically arranged entries that focus on the period's scientific, social and cultural history as well as the political, military and economic developments. For students and general readers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469714">
              <a id="link_23469714" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1PCT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469714,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469714}); ">
               Gale Encyclopedia of U.S. History. Government and Politics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a concise history of the U.S. government and political scene throughout American history, with a particular emphasis on how government and politics affect, and are affected by, social change.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23469719">
              <a id="link_23469719" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://site.ebrary.com/lib/muhlenberg/Top?id=10397702" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23469719,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23469719}); ">
               Princeton Encyclopedia of American Political History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This encyclopedia covers the major forces that have shaped American politics from the founding to today. It traces the history of political institutions, parties, and founding documents. It explains ideas, philosophies, and movements that shaped American politics.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19667832">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19667832">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19667832">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19667832">
          <div id="boxatt19667832" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22991286">
              <a id="link_22991286" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991286,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991354">
              <a id="link_22991354" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991354,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991296">
              <a id="link_22991296" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991296,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22991299">
              <a id="link_22991299" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22991299,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Now I am Become Death', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

           </td>

             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile.php?uid=63915" title="View Profile">

             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Rachel Hamelers
             </div>

            <div class="profileh4">
